trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface that enable users to change their Web site password.
trans-unit.target: 提供使用户能够更改其网站密码的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#Introduction) - [Sending E-mail Messages](#sending_email_messages) - [Views](#views) - [Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [Access Keys and Tab Indexes](#access_keys_and_tab_indexes) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init](#accessing_controls_during_page_load_and_page_init) - [Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [Declarative Syntax#](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## Introduction Use the ChangePassword control on a page to enable your Web site users to change the passwords they use to log on to your Web site.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#Introduction) - [发送电子邮件](#sending_email_messages) - [视图](#views) - [样式和模板](#styles_and_templates) - [验证分组](#validation_groupings) - [访问密钥和选项卡索引](#access_keys_and_tab_indexes) - [可访问性](#accessibility) - [期间 Page_Load 访问控件和 Page_Init](#accessing_controls_during_page_load_and_page_init) - [应用 CSS 样式](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法 #](#DeclarativeSyntax) # # 介绍使用 ChangePassword 控件在页上的启用你网站的用户更改他们用于登录到你的网站上的密码。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, read [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) before continuing.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果你不熟悉的 ASP.NET 提供的登录控件集，请阅读[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)才能继续。

trans-unit.source: For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 通过 HTTP 传输密码是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users.
trans-unit.target: 可以查看或受到恶意用户 HTTP 传输。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，使用登录控件时，你应使用 HTTPS 协议的安全套接字层 (SSL) 加密来确保不能在回发期间读取用户的密码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The ChangePassword control uses the membership provider defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property to change the password stored in the membership provider data store for the Web site.
trans-unit.target: ChangePassword 控件使用在中定义成员资格提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>属性可以更改网站的成员资格提供程序数据存储中存储的密码。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not assign a membership provider, the ChangePassword control uses the default membership provider defined in the section of the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 如果不分配成员资格提供程序，ChangePassword 控件将使用默认成员资格提供程序的 Web.config 文件的节中定义。

trans-unit.source: The ChangePassword control enables users to perform the following actions: - Change their password if they are logged on.
trans-unit.target: ChangePassword 控件使用户可以执行以下操作:-如果用户登录更改其密码。

trans-unit.source: - Change their password if they are not logged on, as long as the page that contains the ChangePassword control allows anonymous access and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: -更改其密码，如果不将它们记录，只要包含 ChangePassword 控件的页面允许匿名访问和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Change the password for a user account, even if they are logged on as a different user.
trans-unit.target: -即使它们以其他用户身份登录，则更改用户帐户的密码。

trans-unit.source: This requires the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 这要求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true` displays the User Name text box, which allows the user to type in a user name.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性`true`显示用户名称文本框中，这样用户就可以键入的用户名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the user is logged on, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> control is populated with the name of the logged-on user.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户登录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>控件中填充登录的用户的名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the password for the given user name is changed, the user is logged on to the account associated with the changed password, even if the user was not logged on to that account previously.
trans-unit.target: 给定的用户名的密码更改后，用户登录到与更改密码时，关联的帐户即使用户未登录到该帐户之前。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Accepting user input is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 接受用户输入是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords.
trans-unit.target: 恶意用户可以发送数据，用于公开的漏洞或运行程序会尝试生成的密码。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，处理用户输入时，应使用的控件的验证功能和安全配置的任何数据提供程序为您的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](../Topic/Securing%20Login%20Controls.md), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Securing Membership](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](../Topic/Securing%20Login%20Controls.md)， [Web 应用程序的基本安全实践](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)，和[保护成员资格](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Sending E-mail Messages The ChangePassword control can be configured to use e-mail services to send the new password to the user.
trans-unit.target: # # 可以配置 ChangePassword 控件发送电子邮件以使用电子邮件服务向用户发送新密码。

trans-unit.source: To send e-mail messages to users from any of ASP.NET Web server controls, you must configure an e-mail server in the Web.config file for your application.
trans-unit.target: 若要从 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件的任何向用户发送电子邮件，你必须配置电子邮件服务器的 Web.config 文件中你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: How to: Install and Configure SMTP Virtual Servers in IIS 6.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 如何︰ 安装和配置 SMTP 虚拟服务器在 IIS 6.0 中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ed204b58-24af-47d0-9687-60e5df5f17f8)。

trans-unit.source: E-mail messages are configured using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> class.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件配置使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: You must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A> property to instruct ASP.NET to send e-mail.
trans-unit.target: 必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>属性指示 ASP.NET 发送电子邮件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition.BodyFileName%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Sending user account names or passwords in e-mail is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 发送电子邮件中的用户帐户名或密码是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: E-mail messages are typically sent in plain text and can be read by special network "sniffing" applications.
trans-unit.target: 电子邮件通常以纯文本发送，并且可以通过"探查"应用程序的特殊网络读取。

trans-unit.source: To improve security, use the mitigations that are described in [Securing Login Controls](../Topic/Securing%20Login%20Controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要提高安全性，请使用中所述的缓解措施[保护登录控件](../Topic/Securing%20Login%20Controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不能保证用户将接收或查看电子邮件。

trans-unit.source: To verify that a user has received a message, provide a confirmation link in the e-mail message that lets the user confirm that the notification was received.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证用户收到一条消息，提供使用户可以确认已收到通知电子邮件消息中的确认链接。

trans-unit.source: ## Views The ChangePassword control has two states, or views: - Change Password view Requests the current password, and requires the user to type the new password twice for confirmation.
trans-unit.target: # # 视图 ChangePassword 控件有两个状态，或视图:-更改密码视图请求的当前密码，并要求用户键入新密码两次以确认。

trans-unit.source: If you allow users who are not logged on to change their passwords, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true` to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> control in Change Password view.
trans-unit.target: 如果你允许登录的用户不上要更改其密码，请将<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性`true`以显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>更改密码视图中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> control allows the user to provide their registered user name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>控件允许用户通过提供其已注册的用户名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there is an error when changing the password, an error message is displayed in the Change Password view, allowing the user to try again.
trans-unit.target: 如果更改密码时出错，则会将一条错误消息显示在更改密码视图中，允许用户重试。

trans-unit.source: - Success view Provides confirmation that the password has been changed.
trans-unit.target: -成功视图提供确认密码已更改。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The functionality for changing passwords and for continue and cancel is attached to any button that has the correct command name, regardless of which view the button is placed on.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 的功能，针对更改密码、 继续和取消附加到具有正确的命令名称，而不考虑哪种视图该按钮放置在任何按钮。

trans-unit.source: For example, a button with the value `commandname=changepassword` in the Success view will attempt to change the password and result in an exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用值的按钮`commandname=changepassword`中成功视图将尝试更改密码并导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: ## Styles and Templates You can use an extensive set of style properties to customize the appearance of the ChangePassword control.
trans-unit.target: # # 样式和模板可用于一套丰富的样式属性自定义 ChangePassword 控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can apply custom templates to the two views if you need complete control over the appearance of the ChangePassword control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，可以将自定义模板应用到两个视图中，如果需要完全控制 ChangePassword 控件的外观。

trans-unit.source: If you define a template for a view, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A> properties are applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果你定义的视图，模板<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>属性将被应用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ControlStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of the controls that you must set in the view templates, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你必须在查看模板中设置的控件的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ChangePassword control examines the content in the template and throws an exception if a required control is not found, is not named correctly, or is of the wrong type.
trans-unit.target: ChangePassword 控件检查模板中的内容，并需的控件找不到、 名为不正确，或者是错误类型的时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you use the content in the template and set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A> property to `true`, the ChangePassword will throw an exception if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> or some other <xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> control is not found for the user name.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你使用模板和组中的内容<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>属性`true`，ChangePassword 将引发异常，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>或某些其他<xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl>用于用户名未找到控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the ChangePassword control style properties and describes which UI element they affect.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的 ChangePassword 控件样式属性，并介绍这些设置会影响哪些用户界面元素。

trans-unit.source: For a list of the properties to which each style applies, see the individual style property.
trans-unit.target: 有关每个样式应用到的属性的列表，请参阅单独的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: |ChangePassword style property|UI element| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| ||Cancel button on the Change Password view.| ||Change Password button on the Change Password view.| ||Continue button on the Success view.| ||Error text displayed to the user.| ||Hyperlinks to other pages.| ||Instructional text on the page that describes how to use the ChangePassword control.| ||Labels for all input fields, such as text boxes.| ||Hints for providing an acceptable password for the Web site.| ||Text displayed to the user when the password has been successfully changed.| ||Text entry input fields.| ||Titles for the Change Password and Success views.| ## Applying CSS Styles The ChangePassword control lets you specify CSS style rules in markup.
trans-unit.target: |ChangePassword 样式属性 |UI 元素 | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| ||取消在更改密码视图上的按钮。 | ||在更改密码视图上的更改密码按钮。 | ||在成功视图继续按钮。 | ||向用户显示的错误文本。 | ||超链接至其他页面。 | ||介绍如何使用 ChangePassword 控件的页面上的说明文本。 | ||标签的所有输入字段，例如文本框。 | ||为网站提供可接受的密码的提示。 | ||已成功更改密码时向用户显示的文本。 | ||文本输入输入字段。 | ||更改密码和成功视图的标题。 | # # 应用 CSS 样式 ChangePassword 控制可用于在标记中指定 CSS 样式规则。

trans-unit.source: If you use templates to customize the appearance of the ChangePassword control, you can specify CSS styles in the markup in the templates.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用模板来自定义 ChangePassword 控件的外观，则可以在模板中的标记中指定 CSS 样式。

trans-unit.source: In that case, no extra outer table is required.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，没有额外的外部表是必需的。

trans-unit.source: You can prevent the table from being rendered by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.RenderOuterTable%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以防止通过设置呈现表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.RenderOuterTable%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.RenderOuterTable%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Validation Groupings The ChangePassword control uses a validation group so that other fields on the same page as the ChangePassword control can be validated separately.
trans-unit.target: # # 验证分组 ChangePassword 控件使用的验证组，以便可以单独验证为 ChangePassword 控件的同一页面上的其他字段。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the ChangePassword control is used as the name of the validation group.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>ChangePassword 控件的属性用作验证组的名称。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a ChangePassword control with the ID `"ChangePassword1"` will use a validation group name of `ChangePassword1` as well.
trans-unit.target: 例如，具有 ID 的 ChangePassword 控件`"ChangePassword1"`将使用的验证组名称`ChangePassword1`以及。

trans-unit.source: To set the validation group that the ChangePassword control is part of, you must create a template with the control, and then change the validation group name.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的验证组中 ChangePassword 控件是的一部分，必须与该控件创建模板，然后更改的验证组名称。

trans-unit.source: To show error messages if a user leaves a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control empty, add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示的错误消息如果某位用户离开<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件空中，添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>到页面的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the ChangePassword control.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控制转移到<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>ChangePassword 控件的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Access Keys and Tab Indexes For information about how to use the property and the property of a ChangePassword control, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 访问密钥以及有关如何使用信息的选项卡索引属性和属性 ChangePassword 控件，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](../Topic/Accessibility%20in%20Visual%20Studio%20and%20ASP.NET.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](../Topic/ASP.NET%20Controls%20and%20Accessibility.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记辅助功能的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](../Topic/Accessibility%20in%20Visual%20Studio%20and%20ASP.NET.md)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](../Topic/ASP.NET%20Controls%20and%20Accessibility.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Accessing Controls During Page_Load and Page_Init ChangePassword control properties represented by text boxes, such as and , are accessible during all phases of the page life cycle.
trans-unit.target: # # 访问控件期间 Page_Load 和 Page_Init ChangePassword 如文本框中，由表示的控件属性和，页生命周期的所有阶段都可访问。

trans-unit.source: In particular, during the Page_Init and Page_Load phases, these properties have the same value they had when the ChangePassword control was rendered.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，在 Page_Init 和 Page_Load 阶段中，这些属性将具有已呈现 ChangePassword 控件时所具有的相同值。

trans-unit.source: If the user changes the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> property by modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> text box, the new value will be available when the changed event is raised, which occurs after the Page_Load phase.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户更改的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>通过修改属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>文本框中，新值将为可用，当引发已更改的事件时，在 Page_Load 阶段之后发生。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if you set the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> property in the Page_Init phase or Page_Load phase and provide a custom handler for a ChangePassword event, any change that the user makes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> text box overrides the value set in the Page_Init or Page_Load phase.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你设置的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>Page_Init 阶段或 Page_Load 阶段中的属性并提供自定义处理程序对于 ChangePassword 事件，用户在进行任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>文本框中重写在 Page_Init 或 Page_Load 阶段的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To assign cancel functionality to any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property of the button to the string that is contained in the CancelButtonCommandName field.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the CancelButtonStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于与 CancelButtonStyle 属性的自定义项的样式设置。

trans-unit.source: |Setting|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|The color of the Cancel button.
The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`BorderColor`|The color of the border around the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`BorderColor`|取消按钮的边框的颜色。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`BorderStyle`|The style of the border around the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`BorderStyle`|取消按钮的边框样式。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.
trans-unit.target: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.

trans-unit.source: The default is `"NotSet"`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`"NotSet"`。

trans-unit.source: Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` setting is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|The width of the border around the Cancel button.| |`CssClass`|The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 某些样式不清楚地出现除非`BorderWidth`设置大于 2。 | |`BorderWidth`|取消按钮的边框的宽度。 | |`CssClass`|用于呈现取消按钮的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` to display the Cancel button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` to display the Cancel button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` to display the Cancel button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|The size of the text in the Cancel button as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` to display the Cancel button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` to display the Cancel button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|The color of the text in the Cancel button.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定其他设置，它们将替代的样式表设置。 | |`Font-Bold` | `true`以粗体类型显示取消按钮文本。 | |`Font-Italic` | `true`以斜体显示的取消按钮文本。 | |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。 | |`Font-Overline` | `true`以指示它上面的行在取消按钮文本显示。 | |`Font-Size`|中作为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>对象取消按钮的文本的大小。 | |`Font-Strikeout` | `true`以显示取消按钮文本为带删除线。 | |`Font-Underline` | `true`以显示取消按钮文本带下划线。 | |`ForeColor`|取消按钮中的文本的颜色。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.|
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 |</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the password is changed for a user account.
trans-unit.target: 更改用户帐户的密码时发生。

trans-unit.source: The ChangedPassword event is raised after the password is changed by the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的成员资格提供程序更改密码之后，将引发 ChangedPassword 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the ChangedPassword event is raised, the following occurs: - If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control attempts to send an e-mail message to the user.
trans-unit.target: 当引发 ChangedPassword 事件后，将发生以下情况:-如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A>设置属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件尝试向用户发送一封电子邮件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MailDefinition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The user is either redirected to the Web site specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessPageUrl%2A> property or the control template specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: -用户可以重定向到中指定的网站<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessPageUrl%2A>属性或控件模板中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A>属性显示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new authorization token for the user is set after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword> event but before the ChangedPassword event.
trans-unit.target: 新用户的授权令牌后设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>事件但 ChangedPassword 事件之前。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangingPassword>

trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` to display the Change Password button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` to display the Change Password button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` to display the Change Password button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|The size of the text in the Change Password button as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` to display the Change Password button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` to display the Change Password button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|The color of the text in the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定其他设置，它们将替代的样式表设置。 | |`Font-Bold` | `true`若要以粗体显示的更改密码按钮文本。 | |`Font-Italic` | `true`以斜体显示的更改密码按钮文本。 | |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。 | |`Font-Overline` | `true`以指示它上面的行在更改密码按钮文本显示。 | |`Font-Size`|中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>对象的更改密码按钮的文本的大小。 | |`Font-Strikeout` | `true`以显示更改密码按钮文本为带删除线。 | |`Font-Underline` | `true`以显示带下划线的更改密码按钮文本。 | |`ForeColor`|中的更改密码按钮的文本的颜色。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`Height`|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the height of the Change Password button.| |`Width`|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the width of the Change Password button.|
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`Height`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>，它表示更改密码按钮的高度。 | |`Width`|A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示更改密码按钮的宽度。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed on the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置更改密码按钮上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: 要在更改密码按钮上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Change Password".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"更改密码"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button to use when rendering the Change Password button of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要呈现的更改密码按钮时可用的按钮类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The ChangePasswordButtonType property gets or sets the type (`Button`, `Image`, or `Link)` of the Change Password button to use when rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: ChangePasswordButtonType 属性获取或设置的类型 (`Button`， `Image`，或`Link)`的更改密码按钮以使用在呈现时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> object that defines the type of button to render for the Change Password button.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>对象，用于定义要呈现的更改密码按钮的按钮的类型。

trans-unit.source: The property value can be one of the three <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> enumeration values: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Button" name="Button" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Image" name="Image" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Link" name="Link" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 属性值可以是三个之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>枚举值︰ <xref uid="langword_csharp_Button" name="Button" href=""> </xref>， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Image" name="Image" href=""> </xref>，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Link" name="Link" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Button" name="Button" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Button" name="Button" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>不是一个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is an error changing the password for the user account.
trans-unit.target: 当更改用户帐户的密码时发生错误时发生。

trans-unit.source: The ChangePasswordError event is raised when the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property encounters an error while attempting to change the password for a user account.
trans-unit.target: 在中指定的成员资格提供程序时引发 ChangePasswordError 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>属性在尝试更改用户帐户的密码时遇到错误。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: This can occur if the user enters an incorrect current password or an invalid new password.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户输入当前密码不正确或无效的新密码，也可能发生。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object does not indicate the reason why changing the password failed, only that the password was not changed.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>对象不表示更改的密码失败的原因，仅的原因，未更改密码。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Use the ChangePasswordError event to perform custom actions when the password is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ChangePasswordError 事件执行自定义操作，未更改密码时。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message that is shown when the user's password is not changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户的密码不会更改将显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: The ChangePasswordFailureText property is displayed when the membership provider rejects the password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 当成员资格提供程序拒绝由用户输入的密码时，将显示 ChangePasswordFailureText 属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> object does not return a reason for rejecting the new password.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>对象不返回拒绝新的密码的原因。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event to examine the rejected password if you want to provide the user with a tip on how to enter an acceptable password (for example, to indicate that a strong password must be provided).
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>事件以检查所拒绝的密码，如果你想要为用户提供有关如何输入 （例如，若要指示必须提供一个强密码） 可接受的密码的提示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The error message to display when the attempt to change the user's password is not successful.
trans-unit.target: 要更改用户的密码的尝试未成功时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Your attempt to change passwords was unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"你更改密码的尝试已失败。

trans-unit.source: Please try again."
trans-unit.target: 请重试。"

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> object used to display the Change Password view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref>用于显示的更改密码视图的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The ChangePasswordTemplate property specifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> object used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: ChangePasswordTemplate 属性指定<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>使用对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How To: Create ASP.NET Web Server Control Templates Dynamically](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[How To︰ 创建 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板动态](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A template is a set of HTML elements and controls that make up the layout for a particular portion of a control.
trans-unit.target: 模板是 HTML 元素和控件的布局控件的特定部分组成的一组。

trans-unit.source: Templates differ from styles: - Templates define the content of a section of a control.
trans-unit.target: 模板不同于样式:-模板定义了控件的节的内容。

trans-unit.source: - Styles specify the appearance of elements in the control.
trans-unit.target: -样式指定控件中的元素的外观。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Web Server Controls Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件模板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下表列出了模板以及相应的控件视图支持<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.target: |模板名称 |控制视图 | |-------------------|------------------| |ChangePasswordTemplate |更改密码 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A>|成功 | 也可以创建或修改.aspx 文件中的控件模板。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.SuccessTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 创建 ASP.NET Web 控件模板以声明方式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[How To︰ 创建 ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板动态](../Topic/How%20To:%20Create%20ASP.NET%20Web%20Server%20Control%20Templates%20Dynamically.md)。

trans-unit.target: |控件 ID |控件类型 |必需/可选 | |----------------|------------------|------------------------| |`Cancel`|导致事件上传方法 （在传递事件沿服务器控件层次结构向上），如任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The button command name must be set to the control ID.|Optional| |`ChangePassword`|Any control that causes event bubbling (passing the event up the server control hierarchy), such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> controls.
trans-unit.target: 按钮命令名称必须设置为控件 id。 |可选 | |`ChangePassword`|导致事件上传方法 （在传递事件沿服务器控件层次结构向上），如任何控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The button command name must be set to the control ID.
trans-unit.target: 按钮命令名称必须设置为控件 id。

trans-unit.target: 在可选控件 ID 赋予错误类型; 的控件不引发任何异常但是，该控件随后将被忽略<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置显示在顶部的文本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>更改密码视图中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.

trans-unit.source: The text to display at the top of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 要显示在顶部的文本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Change Your Password".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"更改密码"。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the password for a user account is changed by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 用户帐户的密码更改成员资格提供程序之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The ChangingPassword event is raised before the membership provider specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A> property is called to change the password for a user account.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的成员资格提供程序之前引发 ChangingPassword 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>属性调用以更改用户帐户的密码。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the ChangingPassword event to perform any processing that is necessary before changing the password, such as checking the new password to make sure it is not in a list of common passwords.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ChangingPassword 事件执行更改的密码，例如检查以确保它不是列表中的常见密码的新密码之前所需的任何处理。

trans-unit.source: The new authorization token for the user is set after the ChangingPassword event but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword> event.
trans-unit.target: 新用户的授权令牌之前设置 ChangingPassword 事件之后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangedPassword>

trans-unit.source: The ChangingPassword event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs> object to `true` if the event handler determines that the membership provider should not be called.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置取消 ChangingPassword 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs>对象传递给`true`如果事件处理程序确定不应该调用成员资格提供程序。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LoginCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the duplicate password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户输入的重复密码。

trans-unit.source: The ConfirmNewPassword property contains the duplicate new password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: ConfirmNewPassword 属性包含用户输入的重复新密码。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> property to define the requirements for the new password.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>属性来定义新的密码要求。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: This regular expression is used to enforce password rules on the client side.
trans-unit.target: 此正则表达式用于强制执行客户端上的密码规则。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A> is not related to the password enforcement that can be configured at the data store level and enforced on the server side.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>可以在数据存储级别配置，并在服务器端强制实施密码实施无关。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.NewPasswordRegularExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The password must meet the minimum requirements set by the in the <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 密码必须满足设置的最小要求在<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.PasswordStrengthRegularExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredNonAlphanumericCharacters%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.Membership.MinRequiredPasswordLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the password does not meet these requirements, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果密码不满足这些要求，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>引发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordError>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 通过 HTTP 传输密码是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users.
trans-unit.target: 可以查看或受到恶意用户 HTTP 传输。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when using login controls, you should use the HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，使用登录控件时，你应使用 HTTPS 协议的安全套接字层 (SSL) 加密来确保不能在回发期间读取用户的密码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Confirm New Password:".
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"确认新密码:"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message that is displayed when the new password and the duplicate password entered by the user are not identical.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置新密码和用户输入的重复密码不相同时，将显示的消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control requires the user to enter the new password twice because the password characters are masked on the screen as the user types them.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件要求用户输入新密码两次由于密码字符被屏蔽在屏幕上，在用户键入它们。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: If the user does not enter the same password in both the New Password text box and the Confirm New Password text box, the message in the ConfirmPasswordCompareErrorMessage property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户未在新密码框和确认新密码文本框中输入相同的密码，将显示 ConfirmPasswordCompareErrorMessage 属性中的消息。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed when the new password and confirmed password are not identical.
trans-unit.target: 新密码和确认的密码不相同时显示的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The default is "The confirm New Password entry must match the New Password entry."
trans-unit.target: 默认值是"确认新密码输入项必须与匹配新的输入密码。"

trans-unit.target: 当用户尝试更改其密码而无需输入中的新密码时显示的错误消息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmNewPassword*>输入的框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ConfirmNewPassword*>

trans-unit.source: Raises the ContinueButtonClick event when the user clicks the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 引发 ContinueButtonClick 事件，当用户单击继续按钮。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Represents <xref uid="langword_csharp_CommandName" name="CommandName" href=""></xref> value of the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref uid="langword_csharp_CommandName" name="CommandName" href=""></xref>继续按钮的值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读的。

trans-unit.source: Use the ContinueButtonCommandName field to represent the `CommandName` value of the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ContinueButtonCommandName 字段来表示`CommandName`继续按钮的值。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when configuring any button to mimic the functionality of the Continue button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: 配置任何按钮以模拟的继续按钮的功能时，这是有用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: To assign continue functionality to any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> property of the button to the string that is contained in the ContinueButtonCommandName field.
trans-unit.target: 为将继续到任何功能指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>中包含的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控制、 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A>ContinueButtonCommandName 字段中包含的字符串的按钮属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.CommandName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The Continue button can appear on the ChangePassword template or the Success template.
trans-unit.target: 继续按钮可以显示在 ChangePassword 模板或成功模板上。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the Continue button redirects the user to the URL stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 单击继续按钮将用户重定向到的 URL 存储在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueDestinationPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To add custom functionality to the Continue button, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将自定义功能添加到继续按钮，创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonClick>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonClick>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of an image to use for the Continue button on the Success view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control if the Continue button is configured by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonType*> property to be an image button.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的成功视图上的继续按钮图像的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"> </xref>如果继续按钮由配置控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonType*>属性来为一个图像按钮。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ContinueButtonType*>

trans-unit.target: 若要继续按钮上显示的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> properties that define the appearance of the Continue button on the Success view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对的集合的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>定义成功的继续按钮的外观的属性查看的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the ContinueButtonStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于与 ContinueButtonStyle 属性的自定义项的样式设置。

trans-unit.source: |Setting|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|The color of the Continue button.
The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`BorderColor`|The color of the border around the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`BorderColor`|继续按钮的边框的颜色。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`BorderStyle`|The style of the border around the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`BorderStyle`|继续按钮的边框样式。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.
trans-unit.target: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.

trans-unit.source: The default is `"NotSet"`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`"NotSet"`。

trans-unit.source: Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|The width of the border around the Continue button.| |`CssClass`|The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 某些样式不清楚地出现除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。 | |`BorderWidth`|继续按钮的边框的宽度。 | |`CssClass`|用于呈现继续按钮的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` to display the Continue button text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` to display the Continue button text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` to display the Continue button text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|The size of the text in the Continue button as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` to display the Continue button text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` to display the Continue button text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|The color of the text in the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定其他设置，它们将替代的样式表设置。 | |`Font-Bold` | `true`以粗体类型显示继续按钮文本。 | |`Font-Italic` | `true`以斜体显示继续按钮文本。 | |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。 | |`Font-Overline` | `true`以指示它上面的行在继续按钮文本显示。 | |`Font-Size`|中作为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>对象继续按钮的文本的大小。 | |`Font-Strikeout` | `true`以显示继续按钮文本为带删除线。 | |`Font-Underline` | `true`以显示带下划线的继续按钮文本。 | |`ForeColor`|继续按钮中的文本的颜色。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`Height`|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the height of the Continue button.| |`Width`|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the width of the Continue button.|
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`Height`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>，它表示继续按钮的高度。 | |`Width`|A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示继续按钮的宽度。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> object that defines the appearance of the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>对象，用于定义的继续按钮的外观。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed on the Continue button on the Success view of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置上的成功视图的继续按钮显示的文本<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display on the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 要在继续按钮上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The default is "Continue".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为"继续"。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button to use when rendering the Continue button for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要呈现的继续按钮时可用的按钮类型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The ContinueButtonType property gets or sets the type (`Button`, `Image`, or `Link)` of the change password button to use when rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control.
trans-unit.target: ContinueButtonType 属性获取或设置的类型 (`Button`， `Image`，或`Link)`呈现时要使用更改密码按钮的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> object that defines the type of button to render for the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"> </xref>对象，用于定义要呈现的继续按钮的按钮的类型。

trans-unit.source: The property value can be one of the three <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> enumeration values: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Button" name="Button" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Image" name="Image" href=""></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_Link" name="Link" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 属性值可以是三个之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>枚举值︰ <xref uid="langword_csharp_Button" name="Button" href=""> </xref>， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Image" name="Image" href=""> </xref>，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_Link" name="Link" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Button" name="Button" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Button" name="Button" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>不是一个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the page that the user will see after clicking the Continue button on the Success view.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置单击成功视图上的继续按钮后，用户将看到的页面的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The ContinueDestinationPageUrl property contains the URL of the Web page that users will see after successfully changing their password.
trans-unit.target: ContinueDestinationPageUrl 属性包含的用户成功更改其密码后看到的网页的 URL。

trans-unit.source: By setting the ContinueDestinationPageUrl, you can control the first page that users see after changing their password.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置 ContinueDestinationPageUrl，可以控制用户更改其密码后看到的第一页。

trans-unit.source: If the ContinueDestinationPageUrl property is the default, an <xref:System.String> field, when the user clicks the Continue button, the page is refreshed and any values on the form are cleared.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ContinueDestinationPageUrl 属性，则默认情况下，<xref:System.String>字段中，当用户单击继续按钮，刷新页面，而且该窗体上的任何值将被清除。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The URL of the page the user is redirected to after clicking the Continue button.
trans-unit.target: 页上用户的 URL 重定向到后单击继续按钮。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate*> contains a control that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl"></xref> interface, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> property of the control is set to "UserName". -or- The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.DisplayUserName*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate*> does not contain a control that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl"></xref> interface, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> property of the control is set to "UserName".
trans-unit.target: <> </> *1> 属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>、 <> </> *1> 包含实现的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl"></xref>接口，与<> *1> 的控件属性设置为"UserName"。 -或- <> </> *1> 属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>、 <> </> *1> 不包含实现的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl"></xref>接口，与<> *1> 的控件属性设置为"UserName"。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate*> does not contain a control that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl"></xref> interface, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> property of the control is set to "CurrentPassword".
trans-unit.target: -或- <> </> *1> 不包含实现的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl"></xref>接口，与<> *1> 的控件属性设置为"当前密码"。

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.ChangePasswordTemplate*> does not contain a control that implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl"></xref> interface, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> property of the control is set to "NewPassword".
trans-unit.target: -或- <> </> *1> 不包含实现的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.IEditableTextControl"></xref>接口，与<> *1> 的控件属性设置为"新密码"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current password for the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取用户的当前密码。

trans-unit.source: The CurrentPassword property contains the current password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 当前密码属性包含当前由用户输入的密码。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Transmitting passwords over HTTP is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 通过 HTTP 传输密码是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: HTTP transmissions can be viewed or compromised by malicious users.
trans-unit.target: 可以查看或受到恶意用户 HTTP 传输。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when using login controls, you should use HTTPS protocol with secure sockets layer (SSL) encryption to ensure that the user's password cannot be read during postback.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，使用登录控件时，你应使用 HTTPS 协议的安全套接字层 (SSL) 加密来确保不能在回发期间读取用户的密码。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[保护登录控件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The current password entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 输入用户的当前密码。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control should display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName*> control and label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>控件应显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName*>控件和标签。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: In order to change their password, users must be authenticated by the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改其密码，用户必须进行身份验证的成员资格提供程序。

trans-unit.source: To allow users who are not logged on to change their password, or to be authenticated by the membership provider with a different user account and then change the password for that account, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control can display a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control to accept the user name.
trans-unit.target: 若要允许用户登录不更改其密码，或可以由其他用户帐户的成员资格提供程序进行身份验证，然后将更改该帐户的密码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件可以显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件接受的用户名。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: You must set the DisplayUserName property to `true` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> control will be displayed to users who are not logged on; otherwise, the user will not be able to specify a user name.
trans-unit.target: 你必须将 DisplayUserName 属性设置为`true`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>控件显示的用户未登录，否则，用户将不能指定用户名。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control should display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>控件应显示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName*>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword.UserName*>

trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> properties that define the appearance of error messages on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对的集合的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>定义的错误消息的外观的属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the style settings that are available for customization with the FailureTextStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于与 FailureTextStyle 属性的自定义项的样式设置。

trans-unit.source: |Setting|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`BackColor`|The color that appears behind the error message text.
The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`BorderColor`|The color of the border around the error message text.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`BorderColor`|错误消息文本的边框的颜色。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`BorderStyle`|The style of the border around the error message text.
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`BorderStyle`|错误消息文本的边框样式。</xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.
trans-unit.target: The style can be `"None"`, `"Dotted"`, `"Dashed"`, `"Solid"`, `"Double"`, `"Groove"`, `"Ridge"`, `"Inset"`, or `"Outset"`.

trans-unit.source: The default is `"NotSet"`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是`"NotSet"`。

trans-unit.source: Some styles do not show up clearly unless the `BorderWidth` value is greater than 2.| |`BorderWidth`|The width of the border around the error message text.| |`CssClass`|The cascading style sheet (CSS) class used to render the error message text.
trans-unit.target: 某些样式不清楚地出现除非`BorderWidth`值是否大于 2。 | |`BorderWidth`|错误消息文本的边框的宽度。 | |`CssClass`|用于呈现错误消息文本的级联样式表 (CSS) 类。

trans-unit.source: If other settings are specified, they will override a style sheet setting.| |`Font-Bold`|`true` to display the error message text in bold type.| |`Font-Italic`|`true` to display the error message text in italic type.| |`Font-Names`|The name of the font face.| |`Font-Overline`|`true` to display the error message text with a line above it.| |`Font-Size`|The size of the text in the error message as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit> object.| |`Font-Strikeout`|`true` to display the error message text as crossed out.| |`Font-Underline`|`true` to display the error message text with an underline.| |`ForeColor`|The color of the text in the error message text.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定其他设置，它们将替代的样式表设置。 | |`Font-Bold` | `true`以粗体类型显示错误消息文本。 | |`Font-Italic` | `true`以斜体显示的错误消息文本。 | |`Font-Names`|字体的名称。 | |`Font-Overline` | `true`以指示它上面的行在错误消息文本显示。 | |`Font-Size`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>对象形式的错误消息中的文本的大小。 | |`Font-Strikeout` | `true`为带删除线显示错误消息文本。 | |`Font-Underline` | `true`以显示错误消息文本中的带下划线。 | |`ForeColor`|错误消息文本中的文本的颜色。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FontUnit>

trans-unit.source: The color can be any of the <xref:System.Drawing.Color> properties.| |`Height`|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the height of the error message text.| |`Width`|A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> that represents the width of the error message text.|
trans-unit.target: 颜色可以是任何<xref:System.Drawing.Color>属性。 | |`Height`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示错误消息文本的高度。 | |`Width`|A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit>表示错误消息文本的宽度。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Unit> </xref:System.Drawing.Color>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> properties that define the appearance of error messages on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref>对象，其中包含<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>定义的错误消息的外观的属性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword"></xref>控件。
